name: Fast Food (itch) (TheGameUser)
description:
This is a survival game, where the player must rush from fast food place to fast food place in order to not die from hunger. Flee the police and avoid all bodies of water. Use WASD or the arrow keys to move. Up with give users a boost in return for a sacrifice of health. Players can steer their cars left and right. Navigate the start screen using the arrow keys and use enter to select options. 

Note: For the game jam the theme is don't stop. The player cannot stop since they are in a rush. Also, the Load File option in the main menu is not implemented, so selecting it will result in nothing happening.

Created by Jack Pleimann
